text: Valdis Ģīlis Valdis Ģīlis (born 1954) is a Latvian politician and was a Deputy of the 9th Saeima.www.cvk.lv He is a member of the People's Party. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Riga Category:People's Party (Latvia) politicians Category:Deputies of the 7th Saeima Category:Deputies of the 8th Saeima Category:Deputies of the 9th Saeima Category:Riga Stradiņš University alumni
title: Valdis Ģīlis
